nodes.text: A factory was controlled by the Galactic Empire during its reign and was protected by at least one security guard. The building was attacked by the rogue MI-series security droid, MI-726, who insulted the security guard and then set off an explosion which destroyed the entire factory. The guard survived and gave a statement on the attack which was then used in a bounty posting on 726. The bounty posting was created due to the destruction of the factory and several other Imperial targets.

The factory was first mentioned in "Bounties to Die For", an article in the sixth issue of Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Gamer magazine series. The magazines were supplements for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game and the factory was included as part of an entry on MI-726 written by S. Mitch Ritchie. The article states only that the bounties are posted by the Empire but does not give a specific era in which they are set.
